clean_data: IT Project Manager II span lITspan span lProjectspan span lManagerspan II IT Project Manager II Chicago IL Experienced Information Technology Project Manager with a demonstrated history of working in the nonprofit organization management industry Skilled in project management and businesssystems analysis Authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience IT Project Manager II Alzheimers Association Chicago IL November 2016 to Present Manager of a diverse portfolio of IT projects centered around process improvement and enterprise application selection development implementation Decreased inconsistency in product delivery averaging 2 months to a sustainable cadence of 3 week sprints by leading the agile transformation of the Business Intelligence Data Warehouse project from a previously waterfall framework Decreased digital incident identification and response time by 40 through the development of an enterprisewide incident response plan which established a crossfunctional response management team as well as set course of action and chain of custody Decreased schedule overrun by 1020 and improved product quality yearoveryear through optimization of schedule and resource planning for the budget development projects for fiscal years 2018 2019 and 2020 Decreased departmental expenditures on application hosting and maintenance by 25000year while increasing crossteam collaboration through the selection and implementation of a unified IT projectproduct management solution centered on Jira intended to replace disparate management development and change control systems Increased SLA compliance of level 1 level 2 helpdesk teams by 10 through efforts to centralize standardize and streamline identification intake and automated routing of work orders through the development and implementation of enhancements to our helpdeskticketing system Decreased the Contact Centers average call time related to program inquiries by 30 through the redevelopment and implementation of version 4 of our homegrown Resource Database and Community Resource Finder applications Business Systems Analyst Alzheimers Association Chicago IL January 2015 to November 2016 A diverse role that included the development of requirements documentation in conjunction with business owners endusers developers and project management as well as systems analysis related to CRM systems and other integrated applications Involved in the enterpriselevel implementation of Personify360 CRM spanning 267 field offices affecting 1500 users Worked closely with various internal and external stakeholder groups in the development of baseline requirements documentation use cases and user stories related to enhancements to base CRM and ancillary application functionality Coordinated various testing and QA initiatives including regression testing user acceptance testing assessment of data integrityhygiene following migrations and uploads of bulk data Achieved an improvement in CRM availabilityuptime to 98 compared with 92 in prior FY by leveraging existing functionality to automate the identification and routing of applicable work orders via our help desk system Account Administrator Education Administrator Association Management Center Chicago IL December 2013 to January 2015 Facilitated administrative educational operations for the Association of Pediatric HematologyOncology Nurses APHON and the Professional Records and Information Services Management PRISM Decreased the cost of the companys conference shipping processes by 40 while decreasing logistical leadtime by 20 through a combination of product standardization and workflow optimization Developed educational products spanning 5 international conferences 8 webinars and 2 certification programs through the coordination of crossfunctional teams external stakeholder groups and association membership Increased member digital engagement by 50 and overall site traffic by 15 through the selection and implementation of community management systems for client websites Worked with technical stakeholders to ensure compatibility with legacy systems Member Services Association Management Center Chicago IL July 2012 to December 2013 Education Masters in Master of Business Administration MBA Lake Forest Graduate School of Management Lake Forest IL 2014 to 2016 Bachelors in Bachelor of Arts Purdue University West Lafayette IN 2006 to 2011 Skills CSM PMP PM Waterfall Scrum Master Project Management Information Technology Microsoft Office 365 SmartSheet JIRA
